page.title: 15EMPOLYMENT IN THURLASTON
page.content: Most people in Thurlaston are involved in Farming and Business.They mainly work out of Thurlaston in places like Rugby,Coventry,Daventry and Warwick.Ten people were interviewed about how they travel to work.Seven drove to work,two walked, and one went by train.People in this area need a car.The people in Thurlaston have lots of occupations such as an engineer, housewife,clerk,book-keeper, secretary,electrician,groom,nanny, journalist and an accountant.Some people have kept their job for as much as fifty years. If you lived in Thurlaston you would find out about work availible by reading a local newspaper or by going to the job centre in Rugby.
